data.name: Furniture Busters
data.detailed_description:
Furniture Busters is a Survival Horror Game about escaping your friend's house and fighting Monsters made of Furniture. Play against Five types of Furniture with unique AI each. You easily running away from Refrigerator? Try to hide from a crazy Armchair that will find you anywhere. You stopping a Lamp with a couple of shots? There is a grandfather clock waiting for you in the hallway. The Furniture will find a way to catch you.

  • The main monsters are Furniture. A variety of monsters that have their own abilities
  • Elements of Survival and Shooter that keep you in suspense and scary
  • AI of monsters that can hide (to scare unexpectedly).
  • Сartoon visual style in spooky and scary atmosphere with plenty of environmental interaction and physics
